name: ELP
tag_list: cellular, advertisement, film, movie, production, edit, filming, editing
overview:
ELP-tv profile ELP-tv provides broadcast services, Movie production, Cellular advertisement, filming and editing services and interactive content. We did advertising films, documentary’s films, drama films, cellular campaigns, internet and creative art films. ELP-tv works with production companies, private organizations and companies around the world to ensure high broadcast quality through very high quality equipment.

Customers include: TVE (Spain), G.G. group, Hot, Yes, AP (news), Telad, Keshet, Tv3 (La Periferica- Spain).

Theatre and dance groups: Jerusalem theatre, Han theatre, Theatre Company Jerusalem and different dance groups.

Private organizations: AJC (usa), Akim, disenhois unitours, Kidum psychometric, small step organization and a lot more.

Services: Movies production Filming and editing services Interactive & Creative environment We also produce movies for Internet and cellular environment.
